column5: let there be pics!
Now thats what i'm talking about right there !!!!!!!!!!!1  Eyes on Ice....   A couple of us OFC'ers might be heading up to the Great White North for some eyes soon
Pics are there Now!!    VERY NICE!!!!!!  Rick
Great stuff Ben, can't wait to get out myself!

Got out today since it wasn't -30 for a change.  Still have to get runners on my trap so I'm not using it yet.  Got to test out the new toy, Humminbird ICE45 flasher.  Very impressed with it, to say the least.   FYI - it is marking bottom but I think my reflection on the display prevented the camera from picking it up in the picture.  We were on a lake that holds walleye, pike and perch.  Almost right away my buddy Bryon had a good scrap with a pike.  Turned out to be a nice 33" that we released without a picture.  The walleye and perch moved in later in the afternoon and we managed a few of them.  Here's my buddy Colin with a nice eye.   My first walleye on the ice this season.   We caught them on set lines and jigging spoons tipped with minnows.  We were fishing a sand/weed flat in about 12-13FOW.
the salt really hurts there Ben....
Nice job.   Whenever I take a picture of my flasher not all of the marks come up either.    The lights turn on and off really fast so the camera will catch them in the off sometimes.
....thats it grimace.
Huh?
Ah.   I get it.      I haven't laid eyes on my spinning flasher since last January.   Soon.  Nice fish again man.   I wish I was prospecting for gold in NW Ontario.
Great report and pics Ben  Nice looking pair of walters you guys caught Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great hardwater report,and some very fine winter "eyes" !!!!....cheers
Nice...
Nice eyes enjoy your hard water season  Rob
Ah Ben you make it look so easy .I need to go ice fishing but no safe ice hear yet.
.....Soweeeeet, those are some dandy "eyes".
Yep, I'm jealous  I'd love a fry of fresh pickeral right about now........it would go great with my bacon and eggs  Sinker

Great stuff Ben, really, and i mean REALLY nice walters you guys got. That hummingbird looks a decent bit of kit too.  I'm just taking a break from putting the runners on my sled too as we speak.  Great stuff.
sweet report!  Sure looks like a couple nice eyes you guys got there!  Cheers!
Thanks for the early ice reports! Im starting to get the itch real bad. Im glad you are happy with the Humminbird unit!

Ben  I get the Red x thing where there should be pics of pick!!!!   As to the runners for the trap I put them on my Yukon but after 2 years they were almost gone So i put a pair of old downhill skis on top of the Runners # years now and still good to go.  If I was doing it again I would Not use the Runners BUT Go directly with the Downhill Skis!!!  Rick
That's odd.  I'm seeing the pics.  Anyone else not seeing them?
Ben, I was able to yesterday, but now only see red X's.  Maybe the site where you uploaded the pics is down or something Leechman
d'oh
"His" site has been down since early last night Ben.
i can't see the pics either.  'he' needs to get his act together..  good stuff ben.
haha.  hope he's working on it
